startMessage: Hello! I'm HotelAssist bot for Edem Resort Medical & SPA. How can I help you?
invalidLastName: Invalid last name. Please, try again.
invalidPhoneNumber: Invalid phone number format. Please, try again.
invalidFirstName: Invalid first name. Please, try again.
invalidDateFormat: The format is incorrect or the date is in the past. Please, try again.
sharePhoneNumber: We need your phone number to complete the booking. Please share it via the button below.
checkoutEarlierThanCheckin: The checkout date cannot be earlier or equal the check-in date. Please, try again.
noContactInfoReceived: No contact info received. Please, share your contact to continue reservation.
shareContact: Share your contact to continue reservation.
enterCheckInDate: Write a check-in date. The format should be DD/MM/YYYY
enterCheckoutDate: Please, write a checkout date. The format should be DD/MM/YYYY

bookingProcess.bookingConfirmation: Booking confirmed! Room: {{roomType}}. Check-in: {{checkIn}}, Check-out: {{checkOut}}, Total nights: {{totalDays}}. Total price: {{totalPrice}} UAH. Name: {{firstName}} {{lastName}}, Phone: {{phone}}. You can pay at the reception in the day of your arrival.
bookingProcess.noRoomsAvailable: Something went wrong and this room type was not found. Please, reach our manager +380673146512 to fix your problem.
bookingProcess.bookingError: Seems like some error happened during booking. Please, try again to book the room.
bookingProcess.errorOccurred: We are sorry to tell that some error happened during booking. Please, try again or reach to our manager directly +380673146512
bookingProcess.roomUnavailable: Room {{roomType}} is unavailable in that dates. You can book {{roomType}} room from {{nextAvailableDate}} or look at other rooms.
bookingProcess.roomNotFound: No room found with such id: {{roomId}}

extraServices.writeCheckInDate: Please, write your check-in date. The format should be DD/MM/YYYY
extraServices.bookedByInfoNotFound: Information about booked user was not found
extraServices.selectService: Please, select a service you are interested in to continue.
extraServices.shareContactNumber: Please, write a phone number for whom the room was booked. The format should be 380XXXXXXXXX
extraServices.serviceUnavailable: Sorry, {{optionName}} of {{serviceName}} is unavailable. Eerlieast availaible date is {{nextAvailableDate}}.
extraServices.selectOptionSpa: Selected program is {{programName}}. Select an option to continue
extraServices.selectedOption: Selected option is {{optionName}}. Please, read the details before continue booking.
extraServices.selectCategory: Selected service is {{serviceName}}. Select a category to continue
extraServices.selectOption: Selected service is {{serviceName}}. Select an option to continue.
extraServices.enterCheckInDateLaundry: Enter the desired date for your laundry service. The format should be DD/MM/YYYY. The default laundry times takes from 1 to 3 days.
extraServices.noOptionsAvailable: Something went wrong and this option was not found. Please, reach our manager +380673146512 to fix your problem.
extraServices.bookingOptionError: Seems like some error happened during booking this option. Please, try again to book the option.
extraServices.laundryServiceOptionConfirmation: Laundry service for {{laundryOption}} reserved! Our workers will take your clothes. Please, leave the clothes on the bed. Note, that laundry will take up to 1 day. Price: {{price}}
extraServices.bookingOptionConfirmation: Booking confirmed! Option: {{optionName}}. Check-in: {{checkIn}}, Check-out: {{checkOut}}. Price: {{totalPrice}}. Name: {{firstName}} {{lastName}}, Phone: {{phone}}. You can pay at the reception in the day of your arrival.
extraServices.oneDayProgramsDate: Please, enter the suitable date for one day program of option {{optionName}}. The format should be DD/MM/YYYY
extraServices.noteCheckoutDate: Please, note that your checkout date will be {{checkoutDate}}.
extraServices.roomPhoneNumberInvalid: Room phone number is not the same as provided. Please, try again.
extraServices.roomNumberInvalid: The room with provided number was not found. Please, try again.
extraServices.abonmentWellnessDayDesc:
- Access to the SPA area (pool; gym; Roman and Finnish saunas; bathhouse; hammam chairs; hydro massage mini pool; Swiss (circular) shower; Kneipp path; phyto bar). 
 - Group fitness classes (Nordic walking, Black Roll training, Aqua aerobics, TRX, Bit Zone, Thai Bo, Fly yoga, Morning exercises).
extraServices.spaDayRelaxationDesc: SPA Day Relaxation is designed for those who dream of an oasis of peace and long-awaited relaxation. Lymphatic drainage and relaxing techniques, signature Ayurvedic rituals, and aromatherapy will provide rest for your body and soul. The result of this program is the restoration of balance in your body.
extraServices.threeDaysProgramsCheckIn: Please, enter the suitable check-in date for three days program of {{optionName}}. The format should be DD/MM/YYYY
extraServices.antiStressWeekendDesc: A variety of sensations and flavors for daily relaxation: cleansing and regenerating balneological treatments, SPA rituals, moisturizing mousses, and nourishing components from herbs and spices; exclusive massage techniques and fitness training; dietary nutrition. A reset after stressful weekdays, restoring your body’s strength and energy, and balancing the connection between Body, Mind, and Spirit. The program is designed for men and women who value their time and care about their health.
extraServices.weekendEasternStyleDesc: A unique journey through the enchanting corners of the Land of Eden, where the richness of sensations, tastes, sounds, and aromas unfolds. We will introduce you to ancient systems of knowledge that promote physical and mental well-being, eliminate stress and depression, and restore your inner Dao. The Eastern-style weekend is a program filled with therapeutic treatments. The light herbal scents of ubtan and oils will bring freshness to every Ayurvedic ritual, acting gently and delicately, resulting in complete relaxation. After these treatments, your skin will be renewed and radiant, smooth and velvety. What’s the secret, you ask? It’s very simple: herbal components, essential oils, extracts, healing muds, and oils activate metabolic processes through contact with the skin, initiating detoxification in the body and improving overall well-being. All procedures in the program are aimed at restoring the body’s natural state of health.
extraServices.expressRecoveryOfTheBodyDesc: Tired of the fast-paced life in the metropolis? Then this program is exactly what you need. It will allow your body to recover in a short period of time. Express procedures are designed to sculpt your body at a rapid pace. A variety of balneological and massage treatments in the Express Body Recovery program will speed up and enhance your body’s regeneration processes, providing strength and energy.
extraServices.spaDetoxDesc: The 'SPA Detox' program is a modern express wellness course based on relaxation and cleansing of the body. The program is designed in such a way that you first restore harmony with your inner spiritual world and then activate all your physical strength. You will experience a wellness complex of physiotherapeutic procedures that use water, seaweed, healing peat, and therapeutic essential oils. The three-day 'SPA Detox' program is a unique and natural set of therapeutic and wellness treatments that will initiate detoxification and help you accumulate vital energy. Once you return to your daily life, you will have these valuable insights at your disposal, which you can use for your benefit every day. We guarantee that before you know it, the reflection in the mirror will reveal a transformed person, with new strength and thoughts that can change the course of your life.
extraServices.mentalHealthDesc: Each of us strives for harmony of soul and body, preserving inner resources, maintaining productivity, and experiencing happiness in all aspects of life, filling every moment of existence with vibrant emotions. Often, we begin to feel like life is passing us by, our body and mind moving at different speeds, and sometimes we seem to stop and can’t move forward, yet we continue our daily marathon of tasks. These feelings lead to mental and physical exhaustion. The Mental Health program is based on psychotherapeutic techniques, breathing practices, yoga therapy, and restorative body treatments that together achieve a holistic effect. This program restores the balance between the spiritual and the physical, providing an inexhaustible source of energy and a sense of a truly fulfilling life, freeing us from the syndrome of waiting. By going through the program at Edem Clinic, you will experience the authenticity of touch, rediscover your sense of smell, taste, and sound, and perceive the world and yourself in a new way! You will once again feel the strength within you, the desire and energy to fulfill your dreams and reach new heights. Joyfulness, openness, spontaneity, and creativity—you will be filled with them once again!
extraServices.detoxNewDescription:
Based on extensive experience, a proprietary detox program was created, aimed at normalizing weight, enhancing the body's systems for eliminating exo- and endotoxins and free radicals, and reducing oxidative stress on the body. The specially developed methods are based on scientifically proven principles and personalized care to prevent aging processes. The program is aimed at restoring cell functions, stabilizing and accelerating metabolism, and enhancing the body's vital forces. During the program, a combination of molecular water, hydro-, phyto-, peloid therapy, and drainage techniques are used. The personalized nutrition program is supervised by dieticians based on your clinical tests, offering the best detox nutrition, improving the absorption of vitamins and microelements. You'll receive recommendations on how to adjust your diet and lifestyle after the program. The team of curators will monitor the results based on comprehensive assessments to identify deficiencies, stimulate the detox process, and promote a healthier lifestyle. 

 Diagnostics: 
 - Consultation with the head physician of the program (initial examination, dynamic analysis, interpretation of results, final consultation with recommendations) (1 session) 
 - Consultation with the head dietitian (initial consultation, dynamic observation, final consultation) (1 session) 
 - Laboratory screening by Edem (comprehensive metabolic and inflammatory markers) (1 session) 
 - Ultrasound diagnostics (liver, gallbladder, bile ducts, pancreas, kidneys, bladder, spleen, thyroid, adrenal glands) (1 session) 
 - Body composition analysis (56 parameters) (2 sessions) 
 - Baseline diagnostics for minerals and vitamins (1 session) 
 - Assessment of oxidative stress levels (1 session) 
 
 Detox Procedures: 
 - Proprietary detox complex (5 sessions) 
 - Physical rehabilitation session (under the supervision of an orthopedic-traumatologist) (3 sessions) 
 - Oxygen-wave barotherapy with chromotherapy (or hypoxic therapy with electrostimulation) (6 sessions, choice determined by physician) 
 - Dry carbonic bath (1 session) 
 
 Dietology and Nutrition: 
 - Nutrition based on the Healthy Life/Detox concept 
 - Detox phytotherapy 
 - Personalized vitamin and micronutrient therapy tailored to clinical needs and deficiencies 
 
 Additional options: 
 - Access to the SPA area (pool, gym, Roman sauna, steam bath, Finnish sauna, hammam chairs, hydromassage mini-pool, Swiss shower (circular), Kneipp path, ice fountain, phytobar) 
 - Group fitness sessions (Nordic walking, Black Roll training, aqua aerobics, TRX, Bit Zone, morning exercises, Fly yoga) 
 - Fixed-rate plan 

 Duration: 7 days
extraServices.productivityDescription:
The program is designed for quick restoration of energy, which has been depleted by complex and intense work, to restore the emotional component of life. It is recommended for workaholics, people in the early stages of emotional burnout, or those showing signs of chronic fatigue syndrome. The program takes place under the supervision of a psychotherapist. A specially selected balneological complex with hydro-massage baths and restorative peloid therapy will allow you to quickly recover from dystonic manifestations. The massage complex will help relieve muscle spasms, restore the balance between the sympathetic and parasympathetic nervous systems. Internal ozone therapy will allow you to feel the biorevitalization of the body, stimulate the immune system, and promote tissue repair. The nutrition during the program also follows proper proportions of proteins, fats, and carbohydrates, with microelements and vitamins for rapid replenishment of deficient ingredients and to restore proper metabolism. 
 Procedures: 
 - Hydro-, phyto-, and aromatherapy (2 sessions) 
 - Mud and phyto treatment with floating (2 sessions) 
 - Energy hydromassage (2 sessions) 
 - Session with a psychotherapist (1 session) 
 - San-Shiro massage (1 session) 
 - Deep body massage (60 min) (1 session) 
 - Sports massage (1 session) 
 - Physical rehabilitation session (1 session) 
 - Outdoor activities (vineyard/garden/workhorse) (1 session) 
 - Personal fitness sessions (Fly-yoga/SUP) (2 sessions) 
 - Ozone therapy (biorevitalization of the body) (2 sessions) 
 - Nutrition based on the Healthy Life concept (3 sessions) 
 
 Additional options: 
 - Access to the SPA area (pool, gym, Roman sauna, steam bath, Finnish sauna, hammam chairs, hydromassage mini-pool, Swiss shower (circular), Kneipp path, ice fountain, phytobar) 
 Group fitness sessions (Nordic walking, Black Roll training, aqua aerobics, TRX, Bit Zone, morning exercises, Fly yoga) 
 - Fixed-rate plan 

 Duration: 3 days
extraServices.detoxBodyDescription:
The program provides a deep impact on the body’s structure to improve skin elasticity, tone, and contour, preventing skin aging processes. The goal of the program is to maximize the impact on the metabolic correction of connective tissue in the skin to improve and accelerate its regeneration and structural elements by inhibiting collagen biodegradation and its denaturation processes. By combining restorative procedures, we mitigate the harmful effects of environmental factors, unhealthy lifestyles, and aging. The symmetry of your body will improve, and the skin will achieve a healthy look and physiological relief. The program utilizes a combination of physical, temperature, pharmaceutical, and other factors in ways and dosages that guarantee the maximum effect. The program's lead doctor will create a personal plan for recovery based on your needs and experience, considering the most popular procedures among our guests. This plan is designed to prepare you for important events. A critical success factor for achieving the desired result is the precise combination of procedures, supplements, and specific nutrition. The program is supervised by Edem Clinic dermatologists, who may suggest additional body aesthetics procedures if needed. 

 Diagnostics: 
 - Dermatologist consultation (1 session) 
 
 Procedures: 
 - Proprietary detox peel (skin peel and Vichy shower) (1 session) 
 - Submerged manual relaxation hydromassage (1 session) 
 - Submerged manual toning hydromassage (2 sessions) 
 - SPA capsule session with reverse cleansing (1 session) 
 - Molecular therapy using cold apparatus (1 session) 
 - Vitamin bath in Detox style (1 session) 
 - Personal training session with a trainer (rhythmic and passive stretching) (2 sessions) 
 
 Dietology and Nutrition: 
 - Detox strong nutrition 
 - Detox phytotherapy 
 
 Additional options: 
 - Access to the SPA area (pool, gym, Roman sauna, steam bath, Finnish sauna, hammam chairs, hydromassage mini-pool, Swiss shower (circular), Kneipp path, ice fountain, phytobar) 
 Group fitness sessions (Nordic walking, Black Roll training, aqua aerobics, TRX, Bit Zone, morning exercises, Fly yoga) 
 - Fixed-rate plan 

 Duration: 3 days
extraServices.recoveryAndDetectionOfDiseaseRisks: Recovery and detection of disease risks
extraServices.recoveryAndDetectionOfDiseaseRisksDescri:
The program for recovery and risk identification of diseases is based on four scientific evidence-based approaches to the body: prediction, prevention, personalization, and precision. The program uses personalized, preventive medical approaches to diagnosis and predicting the development of possible diseases, 'body as a resource for health,' which influence aging processes and prevent them. Proprietary methods of treatment help improve the body's self-regulation, increase energy, and trigger biorevitalization processes. The team of doctors will provide you with instructions on how to work with your body in areas like nutrition (considering your body's characteristics), nutritional support, and prevention and prediction of diseases, which generally improves your quality of life. 

 Diagnostics: 
 - Consultation with the head physician of the program (initial examination, dynamic analysis, interpretation of tests, final consultation with recommendations) (1 session) 
 - Consultation with the head dietitian (initial consultation, dynamic observation, final consultation) (1 session) 
 - Laboratory screening by Edem (1 session) 
 - Ultrasound diagnostics (complex research: liver, gallbladder, bile ducts, pancreas, kidneys, bladder, spleen, abdominal vessels, thyroid, neck, lymph nodes) (1 session) 
 - Ultrasound diagnostics of male reproductive organs/prostate (1 session) 
 - Ultrasound diagnostics of lungs and pleural cavity (1 session) 
 - Ultrasound diagnostics of arteries and deep veins of the lower extremities (1 session) 
 - Stress ECG test with electrocardiography monitoring during ergometry and heart ultrasound (1 session) 
 - Body composition analysis (56 parameters) (1 session) 
 - Comprehensive assessment of the body for minerals, vitamins, essential trace elements, and oxidative stress levels (1 session) 
 - Bioenergetic diagnostics and correction (1 session) 
 - Antioxidant therapy (1 session) 
 - 3D skin diagnostics on Oprata Dome analyzer (1 session) 
 
 Procedures: 
 - Proprietary detox complex: hydro-, phyto-, aromatherapy with massage (2 sessions) 
 - Mud and phyto treatment with floating (1 session) 
 - Joint massage and manual therapy (1 session) 
 - Consultation with a rehabilitation specialist on physical training (1 session) 
 - Local body wellness SPA capsule with reverse mud therapy (1 session) 
 - Dry carbonic bath (1 session) 
 - Salt and cryotherapy (5 sessions) 
 
 Dietology and Nutrition: 
 - Nutrition based on the Healthy Life concept 
 - Individual approach to vitamin and micronutrient therapy for clinical conditions and deficiencies in the body 
 - Detox phytotherapy 
 
 Additional options: 
 - Access to the SPA area (pool, gym, Roman sauna, steam bath, Finnish sauna, hammam chairs, hydromassage mini-pool, Swiss shower (circular), Kneipp path, ice fountain, phytobar) 
 - Group fitness sessions (Nordic walking, Black Roll training, aqua aerobics, TRX, Bit Zone, morning exercises, Fly yoga)
extraServices.detoxBodyAndMindDescription:
The program provides organic and psycho-emotional detoxification, cleansing, and elimination of exo- and endotoxins that accumulate in the body due to improper lifestyle choices (daily routine, diet, and eating habits, chronic stress), environmental factors, and poor nutrition. It is recommended for chronic fatigue, psycho-emotional burnout, and 'stress overload' conditions. Specially developed methods are based on scientifically proven principles and personalized care, utilizing the latest knowledge in anti-aging processes. The program aims to restore cell functions, stabilize homeostasis, accelerate metabolism, and enhance the body's vital forces. During the program, a combination of water, hydro-, phyto-, peloid therapy, and air methods is applied. The program focuses on the central nervous system (psychological, stress states) using classic methods of the proprietary detox program. 
 Procedures: - Bioenergetic diagnostics and correction (2 sessions) Consultation with a psychotherapist (1 consultation, 4 sessions) 
 - Proprietary detox complex: hydro-, phyto-, and aromatherapy (4 sessions) 
 - Mud and phyto treatment with floating (2 sessions) 
 - Mono-purification of the liver (Lokka 'Cleansing') (1 session) 
 - Oxygen-wave barotherapy with chromotherapy (2 sessions) 
 - Physical rehabilitation sessions (joint diagnosis with an orthopedic-traumatologist) (1 session) 
 - Personal training with a trainer (2 sessions) 
 - Group fitness training (Nordic walking, Black Roll training, aqua aerobics, TRX, Bit Zone, morning exercises, Fly yoga) (7 sessions) 
 - Detox nutrition (7 sessions) 
 - Phytocomplex (1 session) 
 - Detox mineral water-balancing treatment (1 session) 
 
 Dietology and Nutrition: Nutrition based on the Detox concept 
 Additional options: 
 - Access to the SPA area (pool, gym, Roman sauna, steam bath, Finnish sauna, hammam chairs, hydromassage mini-pool, Swiss shower (circular), Kneipp path, ice fountain, phytobar) 

 Duration: 7 days
extraServices.reEnergyDescription:
The program is designed for those who want to take a short break to recharge and improve their well-being. In this program, we have included the most effective recovery methods developed by specialists at the Health Recovery Center. It includes a special diet consisting of healthy and light meals prepared according to the principles of proper nutrition. 
 Procedures: 
 - Hydro-, phyto-, and aromatherapy (2 sessions) 
 - Mud and phyto treatment with floating (2 sessions) 
 - Energy hydromassage (2 sessions) 
 Manual lymphatic drainage massage (1 session) 
 - Multi-sculptural modeling procedure (1 session) 
 - Pressotherapy (1 session) 
 - Ayurvedic facial ritual based on dosha type (1 session) 
 - Psycho-emotional harmonization in a salt room with aromatherapy (2 sessions) 
 Dietology and Nutrition: 
 Nutrition based on the Healthy Life concept 
 Additional options: 
 - Access to the SPA area (pool, gym, Roman sauna, steam bath, Finnish sauna, hammam chairs, hydromassage mini-pool, Swiss shower (circular), Kneipp path, ice fountain, phytobar) 
 - Fixed-rate plan 
 - Group fitness sessions (Nordic walking, Black Roll training, aqua aerobics, TRX, Bit Zone, morning exercises, Fly yoga) 

 Duration: 3 days.
extraServices.fitHealthDescription:
One of the most effective express programs that incorporates the most result-driven methods of modern fitness. The program's comprehensive approach, combined with medical diagnostics, allows for individual progress and provides the quickest path to achieving results. The program is suitable for both beginners and professional athletes. It targets goals such as weight loss, sports rehabilitation, the development of techniques for performing exercises and maintaining posture, and localized impact on problem areas of the abdomen. 
 Focused on: 
 - Metabolic correction and weight reduction 
 - Localized impact on problem areas of the abdomen 
 - Strengthening of the spinal muscles 
 - Achieving personal goals, obtaining an aesthetically pleasing figure and well-being 
 - Harmonious physical and mental development 
 *A doctor's consultation is recommended before starting the program. This consultation is not included in the program. 
 
 Procedures: 
 - Functional testing of physical fitness level (1 session) 
 - Personal training with methods developed by rehabilitation doctors (3 sessions) 
 - Hydro-, phyto-, and aromatherapy (mineral and sports recovery baths) (2 sessions) 
 - Mud and phyto treatment with floating (1 session) 
 - Energy hydromassage (Vichy shower) (3 sessions) 
 - Sports toning massage for various muscle groups (3 sessions) 
 - Head and neck massage (1 session) 
 - Relaxation massage (1 session) 
 - Abdominal massage (manual and apparatus techniques with contrast methods) (1 session) 
 
 Nutritionology, Dietology, and Nutrition: 
 - Nutritional support (adaptogens, vitamins, amino acid complexes) 
 - Nutrition based on the Healthy Life concept 
 
 Additional options: 
 Access to the SPA area (pool, gym, Roman sauna, steam bath, Finnish sauna, hammam chairs, hydromassage mini-pool, Swiss shower (circular), Kneipp path, ice fountain, phytobar) 
 Group fitness sessions (Nordic walking, Black Roll training, aqua aerobics, TRX, Bit Zone, morning exercises, Fly yoga) 
 Fixed-rate plan 

 Duration: 3 days
extraServices.golfClubGeneralInformation:
Once you step onto the golf course and feel the pleasant thrill of a successful shot, you will be forever filled with the feeling of victory and a sense of belonging to the aristocratic game of the chosen ones. One of the best golf clubs in Ukraine offers:

Golf Training
Individual lesson with a coach (academic hour*) – 1,500 UAH
Individual lesson with Head PRO (academic hour*) – 3,700 UAH
Package of 5 individual lessons with a coach – 6,500 UAH
Package of 10 individual lessons with a coach – 11,500 UAH
Masterclass for 2 people – 2,800 UAH
Group golf masterclass for 3 or more people – 1,200 UAH
The price includes club and ball rental, and a coach consultation for the duration of the academic hour*

Green fee and rental
Green fee 9 holes – 1,500 UAH
Green fee 18 holes – 2,000 UAH
Green fee (academic course) 18 holes (3 rounds) – 1,000 UAH
Driving Range, Putting Green, Chipping Green membership – 7,000 UAH/month
Caddie services 9 holes – 1,200 UAH
Trolley rental – 350 UAH/round
Club rental – 700 UAH/round
3-club rental – 400 UAH
Basket of balls (40) – 300 UAH
Basket of balls (80) – 500 UAH
Equipment storage 1 day – 100 UAH
Equipment storage 1 month – 500 UAH
Equipment storage 1 year – 5,000 UAH
Electric cart rental (9 holes) – 2,000 UAH
Electric cart rental (18 holes) – 2,500 UAH

Tournament Participation
Organization fee – 500 UAH
Green fee 18 holes – 1,000 UAH
Juniors (ages 6 to 12) – 750 UAH

Memberships
Annual membership (Green fee) after completing golf school – 25,000 UAH
Annual membership (Green fee + balls) – 50,000 UAH
50% discount on all services for children aged 6 to 12

*Academic hour – 45 minutes 
 For more information or booking please call +380673146512
extraServices.restaurantPanoramaDescription: Panorama Restaurant is a temple of healthy, eco-friendly food. Every dish is a burst of energy, as it is made from ingredients grown in Edem’s gardens. Through the large panoramic windows, you can enjoy a view of Lake Molodosti. The restaurant serves guests who come for comprehensive programs at the Health Recovery Center — Detox, Anti-Age, Fit Health. We create personalized menus for our guests, taking into account their physiological characteristics to make the dishes as beneficial as possible. Discover that healthy food can be both delicious and incredibly beautiful at our restaurant near Lviv.
extraServices.restaurantDeVineDescription: 'DeVine offers 354 wine selections, including 4 indigenous varieties from the Bordeaux wine collection. More than 3,000 bottles from 121 regions across 22 countries are stored in Liebherr wine cabinets. The restaurant's menu was specially curated by the head chef to ensure guests get the maximum enjoyment from wine tastings and the exquisite flavors of the dishes. The main principle behind the wine list is diversity. I aimed to cover and present wines from all corners of the world with the widest possible variety of grape varieties. Now, with such an assortment, it’s no problem to find a wine for any guest and any dish. Both the sommelier and the guests contribute to the wine list. I always listen to their preferences and try to make the wine selection exciting to offer new, unforgettable gastronomic experiences and emotions,' said DeVine's head sommelier, Yurii Ovchar. DeVine became a finalist for the 2016 National Restaurant Award SIL® in the 'Best Wine List' category, and this is just the beginning. We created a special wine set on the menu for guests to appreciate the nuances of different varieties. In the spring of 2016, our own vineyard was established at the complex. By the fourth season, you will be able to taste wine made at Edem.
extraServices.restaurantEdemDescription: The spirit of romance and classic luxury. Men in suits, women flaunting elegant dresses. Edem Restaurant seems to have stepped out of the pages of Fitzgerald's novels, where the bohemian atmosphere is felt even in the smallest details. Here, we will meet for breakfast, setting the tone for the entire day. Every dish is a masterpiece from the chef, because perfection lies in the details.
extraServices.extraCleaningInformation:
Need your room refreshed during your stay? 

 While our standard cleaning service is provided once every 3-5 days or after your stay, you can request Extra Cleaning at any time for additional comfort. This service includes a thorough cleaning of your room, from dusting and vacuuming to sanitizing the bathroom and refreshing linens, ensuring a spotless and welcoming space throughout your visit.
extraServices.optionNotFound: Sorry, {{optionName}} is unavailable. Eerlieast availaible date is {{nextAvailableDate}}.
extraServices.laundryShirtDesc: Our laundry service for shirts ensures your garments are professionally cleaned and perfectly pressed. Whether it’s a casual shirt or a formal dress shirt, we take special care to preserve the fabric’s quality while removing any stains or wrinkles. Your shirt will be returned fresh, neatly folded, or hung as per your preference. This service includes gentle washing with eco-friendly detergents and professional ironing to keep your shirt looking crisp and ready to wear.
extraServices.laundryPantsDesc: Our laundry service for pants provides thorough cleaning and precise pressing to ensure your trousers look sharp and fresh. Whether it's casual pants, formal trousers, or jeans, we handle each garment with care, using gentle washing techniques to maintain fabric integrity. Your pants will be carefully pressed to remove any creases and returned either folded or hung, depending on your preference. We use eco-friendly detergents to keep your clothes in excellent condition while being mindful of the environment.
extraServices.laundryDressDesc: Our laundry service for dresses ensures your garments receive the delicate care they deserve. Whether it’s a casual sundress or an elegant evening gown, we use specialized cleaning techniques to protect the fabric’s texture and color while removing stains and wrinkles. Your dress will be expertly pressed and returned to you either hung or folded, based on your preference. We take extra care with intricate details, such as lace or embellishments, and only use eco-friendly, gentle detergents to preserve the quality and longevity of your dress
extraServices.laundrySuitDesc: Our professional laundry service for suits ensures your garments are carefully cleaned and perfectly pressed, maintaining their sharp, tailored look. Whether it's a business suit or formal attire, we take special care to preserve the fabric, structure, and color of your suit. We use gentle yet effective cleaning techniques to remove stains and odors while protecting the natural fibers. Your suit will be meticulously pressed to retain its crisp shape and returned to you on a hanger, ready to wear. We also use eco-friendly detergents to ensure your suit remains in pristine condition while minimizing environmental impact
extraServices.laundryTshirtDesc: Our laundry service for T-shirts ensures your everyday garments are cleaned and refreshed with care. Whether it's a casual tee or an athletic shirt, we use gentle washing techniques to remove stains and odors while preserving fabric softness and color. Your T-shirt will be neatly folded or hung, depending on your preference, and returned in perfect condition. We use eco-friendly detergents to ensure your clothes stay fresh and soft, while also being gentle on the environment.
extraServices.laundrySweaterDesc: Our laundry service for sweaters provides gentle yet thorough care to keep your garments soft and cozy. Whether it's a wool, cashmere, or cotton sweater, we use specialized washing techniques that protect the fabric's fibers, preventing shrinkage and maintaining its softness. Stains and odors are carefully removed, and your sweater will be neatly folded or hung, depending on your preference. We also use eco-friendly detergents that are gentle on both your clothing and the environment, ensuring your sweater remains in excellent condition.
extraServices.laundryUnderwearDesc: Our laundry service for underwear offers the utmost care and hygiene for your most personal garments. We use gentle washing techniques that ensure thorough cleaning while preserving fabric softness and elasticity. Your underwear will be washed using eco-friendly detergents, ensuring they are fresh, comfortable, and safe for sensitive skin. Each item is carefully folded and returned in pristine condition.
extraServices.laundrySocksDesc: Our laundry service for socks ensures that your socks are thoroughly cleaned and refreshed. Using gentle yet effective washing techniques, we remove stains and odors while preserving the softness and elasticity of the fabric. We use eco-friendly detergents that are gentle on fabrics and safe for sensitive skin. Your socks will be neatly paired and folded, ready to keep your feet comfortable and fresh.
extraServices.laundryJacketDesc: Our laundry service for jackets ensures that your outerwear is professionally cleaned and expertly cared for. Whether it's a light jacket or a heavier coat, we use specialized cleaning techniques to remove stains, odors, and dirt while maintaining the jacket's fabric integrity, color, and shape. We take special care with various materials, including wool, leather, and synthetic fabrics. Your jacket will be returned neatly pressed and hung, ready to wear. We also use eco-friendly detergents that are gentle on your jacket and the environment.
extraServices.laundryBathrobeDesc: Our laundry service for bathrobes guarantees a thorough cleaning that leaves your bathrobe feeling soft and luxurious. We use gentle washing techniques to maintain the fabric’s absorbency and plush texture, ensuring comfort with every wear. Stains and odors are effectively removed, and your bathrobe will be returned neatly folded or hung, depending on your preference. We use eco-friendly detergents that are safe for sensitive skin and help preserve the softness of the fabric.
extraServices.laundryTowelsDesc: Our laundry service for towels ensures that your towels are cleaned thoroughly while maintaining their softness and absorbency. We use gentle washing techniques to remove stains and odors, leaving your towels feeling fresh and plush. Whether it's bath towels, hand towels, or washcloths, we carefully handle each item to preserve its quality. Your towels will be returned neatly folded and ready for use. We also use eco-friendly detergents that are safe for sensitive skin and help extend the life of the fabric.
extraServices.laundryFullServiceDesc: Our full laundry service provides a comprehensive solution for all your clothing and linen needs during your stay. This service covers everything from shirts, pants, and dresses to towels, bathrobes, and delicate items, ensuring every garment is cleaned, pressed, and returned in perfect condition. Using eco-friendly detergents and professional cleaning techniques, we handle each item with care to preserve fabric quality and freshness. Whether you have casual wear or formal attire, your laundry will be neatly folded or hung based on your preferences and delivered promptly

faqSection.selectQuestion: Please, select quesiton you are interested in.
faqSection.whatServicesOffer: What services does Edem Resort & SPA offer?
faqSection.whatServicesOfferAnswer: Edem Resort & SPA is a luxury complex combining a spa, golf club, wellness programs, restaurants with organic cuisine, a hotel with luxurious rooms, and various event hosting opportunities. Here, you will find everything for relaxation and body and soul rejuvenation.
faqSection.spaWorkingHours: What are the working hours of the spa?
faqSection.spaWorkingHoursAnswer: The spa zone operates daily from 08:00 to 22:00. You can book treatments in advance through the administrator
faqSection.spaTreatments: How can I book spa treatments?
faqSection.spaTreatmentsAnswer: You can book spa treatments through our administrator by calling the resort or use the Telegram bot for quick booking.
faqSection.detoxAndWelnessPrograms: Do you offer detox and wellness programs?
faqSection.detoxAndWelnessProgramsAnswer: Yes, Edem Resort offers a wide selection of wellness programs, such as Detox Body & Mind, stress recovery programs, and anti-age programs. Detailed information about each program can be found on our website or from the administrator.
faqSection.golfCost: What is the cost of playing golf?
faqSection.golfCostAnswer: The cost of playing golf depends on the number of holes. Green fees for 9 holes cost 1,500 UAH, and for 18 holes, it’s 2,000 UAH. Additional services such as golf cart rental or caddie services are charged separately.
faqSection.rentConferenceRoom: Can I rent a conference room for business events?
faqSection.rentConferenceRoomAnswer: Yes, Edem Resort offers several halls for conferences, seminars, and business meetings. We provide a full range of services for organizing your event, including technical support, catering, and accommodation for participants.
faqSection.restaurants: What restaurants are available at Edem Resort?
faqSection.restaurantsAnswer: We have several restaurants, including Panorama and DeVine, offering eco-friendly dishes made from locally sourced ingredients. In our restaurants, you can enjoy both traditional and exotic dishes prepared by our chefs.
faqSection.wedding: Can I organize a wedding at the resort?
faqSection.weddingAnswer: Yes, we specialize in organizing weddings, corporate events, and private celebrations. The resort has everything needed for a perfect event, from luxurious banquet halls to beautiful natural locations for the ceremony.
faqSection.gym: Do you have a gym and fitness services?
faqSection.gymAnswer: Yes, our spa complex includes a modern gym and offers group fitness classes, including yoga, aqua aerobics, and Nordic walking. You can sign up for classes through the administrator or the bot.
faqSection.transfer: Do you offer transportation services to and from the resort?
faqSection.transferAnswer: Yes, we provide transportation services to and from Lviv or the airport. You can book the transfer in advance through the administrator.
faqSection.booking: How can I book a room?
faqSection.bookingAnswer: You can book a room by contacting the administrator or via Telegram bot.
faqSection.changeBooking: Can I change or cancel my booking?
faqSection.changeBookingAnswer: You can change or cancel your booking by contacting the administrator. Please note our cancellation and change policies, which depend on the terms of your service package.
